New Records: The Oklahoma City Thunder achieved their 11th consecutive victory.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored a game-high 35 points and recorded seven assists.
Key Match Events: The Thunder led 76-50 at halftime and outscored the Grizzlies 42-19 in the second quarter.
The Grizzlies were short-handed without key players Ja Morant and Zach Edey.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was notable for the Thunder's dominance and the Grizzlies' absence of star players.
